steps package¶

Submodules¶

steps.filterUniqueBam module¶

Martin Kircher Stripped down from paleomix

steps.filter_bam_ancient module¶

steps.filter_bam_ancient.check_c_2_t(base)[source]¶

C to T checker

steps.filter_bam_ancient.check_g_2_a(base)[source]¶
steps.filter_bam_ancient.downweight_quality(quality, change_bases_c=None, change_bases_t=None)[source]¶

Returns PHRED qualities that remove downweight Cs or Ts at the start of reads.

steps.filter_bam_ancient.filter_bam(input_file, output_file, downweight_number, ctot, gtoa)[source]¶

Takes a bam file as input and weights the quality of the reads down. Need to ensure we write the header out :) Investigate pysam and look for a header, this should really help us understand how to get this bam filter working and writing the bam files directly back out to the terminal.

steps.filter_bam_ancient.filter_fastq(input_file, output_file, downweight_number, ctot, gtoa)[source]¶

Takes a Fastq file as input and weights the quality of the bases down at the start and the end of the reads.

steps.vcf_to_fasta module¶

This program takes a vcf input and converts the VCF file to a fasta file containing all the relevant information for further analysis. In humans only one such problem exists with an indel being called in a different place on the reference sequence.

steps.vcf_to_fasta.is_ga_or_ct(ref, alt)[source]¶
